title: Food Truck at World's End
description: Food Truck at World's End [short story]The world ended, not in a way anyone prophesied or believed it would. It fell apart slowly, bit by bit. Civilization came undone. There were survivors - those folks with the wits to live on a world swallowed up in chaos.There remained a legacy from the bygone days when the world was still somewhat functional. It was called The World Chili Cook-Off, the last great social gathering.Joe was a man that survived by using his talents for making chili. He bartered for it from his food truck, The Ghost Chili. He created his masterpiece, what he called Transcendental Chili. He dreamed of entering the big cook-off and winning first place. But he wanted more than an award. He wanted to change the world.
author: Joe Chili
